definition: Weifang prefecture level city in Shandong

sentences.english: Mr. Shi Wanxin, the director of the Education Bureau, comes to the school to guide us.
sentences.chinese: 濰坊市教育局副局長時萬信來我校檢查指導工作。

sentences.english: Weifang has basic conditions on Weixian turnip' s development.
sentences.chinese: 濰坊市具備濰縣蘿蔔健康持續發展的基礎條件。

sentences.english: Weifang City Ocean Chemical Hi-tech Industrial Development Zone.
sentences.chinese: 山東省濰坊市海洋化工高新技術產業開發區。

sentences.english: Weifang has already obtained the primary achievement on the production of Weixian turnip.
sentences.chinese: 濰坊市的濰縣蘿蔔發展已取得初步成效。

sentences.english: Study on flood resources utilization by Zipingpu key water-control project;
sentences.chinese: 洪水資源利用是解決濰坊市水資源短缺的重要途徑。

sentences.english: Utilization of flood water resources is an important way of solving the shortage of water resources in Weifang City.
sentences.chinese: 洪水資源利用是解決濰坊市水資源短缺的重要途徑。

sentences.english: At the same time, it put forward suggestion about Weifang city's marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 同時對濰坊市城市營銷戰略的實施提出了建議。
